text: William Duer is the name of: *William Duer (Continental Congressman) (1743–1799), New York speculator, Continental Congressman and Assistant Secretary of the Treasury *William Alexander Duer (1780–1858), U.S. jurist, President of Columbia University, son of the Continental Congressman *William Duer (U.S. Congressman) (1805–1879), U.S. lawyer and Congressman from New York City; grandson of the Continental Congressman
title: William Duer
